description:
One of 15 Applied Research Collaborations (@nihrarcs.bsky.social) funded by (@nihr.bsky.social).

We support applied health & care research across Cornwall, Devon, Somerset, and beyond.

More from us: linktr.ee/nihrpenarc

display_name: NIHR Applied Research Collaboration (ARC) South London
NIHR Applied Research Collaboration North East & North Cumbria
description:
Working together to achieve better, fairer health and care at all ages and in all places. One of 15 Applied Research Collaborations (ARCs) @nihrarcs.bsky.social in England. Funded by @nihr.bsky.social

Visit our website at www.arc-nenc.nihr.ac.uk
Mental health researcher, co-lead for NIHR Mental Health Research Initiative in the South West Peninsula, (un)committed trail runner, childless cat lady, some time surfer and singer.

display_name: Applied Research Collaboration North West Coast (ARC NWC)
description:
NIHR ARC North West Coast is one of 15 @nihrarcs.bsky.social
funded by the National Institute for Health and Care Research (@nihr.bsky.social). We work with our partners in the North West of England on applied health and care research.
We are part of the National Institute for Health and Care Research and hosted by South London and Maudsley NHS Foundation Trust in partnership with King's College London. www.maudsleybrc.nihr.ac.uk
Senior Lecturer at the University of Exeter Medical School and NIHR ARC South West Peninsula.

Healthcare & psychological researcher at NIHR ARC South West & Plymouth University. Hiking enthusiast & nature lover often found on Dartmoor. 
orcid.org/0000-0001-7585-8886 
www.researchgate.net/profile/Stuart-Spicer
